word_mean: 生姜，姜：热带植物生姜(Zingiber officinale)干的根茎，用作调味剂，也用于治疗肠胃气胀和绞痛

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English gingifer, conflated in Middle English with Old French gingimbre, from medieval Latin gingiber, from Greek zingiberis, from Pali siṅgivera, of Dravidian origin

encyclopedia.content: ginger 英['dʒindʒə]美['dʒindʒə] n. 1.姜，生姜 2.姜黄色 a. 1.姜黄色的 v.[T] 1.使有活力；使活跃；使兴奋 n. 1.姜，生姜 2.姜黄色 a. 1.姜黄色的 v.[T] 1.使有活力；使活跃；使兴奋 时 态：gingered,gingering,gingers 形容词：gin'gery 同反义词 参考例句 We'll send new cadres to ginger up timorous local committee 我们将派新干部去充实畏缩不前的地方委员会。Th

entry.def: Ginger is the root of a plant that is used to flavour food. It has a sweet spicy flavour and is often sold in powdered form.
Ginger is used to describe things that are orangey-brown in colour.

example.ex: She was a mature lady with dyed ginger hair.
example.tran: 她是一位头发染成姜黄色的成熟女性。

means.word_mean: 1. perennial plants having thick branching aromatic rhizomes and leafy reedlike stems
